mapper.select:
SELECT THCLAV.ID, THCLAV.IDCARDNUMBER, THCLAV.STATUS, THCLAV.CUSTOMERSERVICEMANAGER, THCLAV.APPLYDATE, THCLAV.DISTRICTNAME, THCLAV.CREDITPRODUCTNAME, THCLAV.CUSTOMERSERVICEOFFICER, THCLAV.LOANBILLNUMBER, THCLAV.PHONENUMBER, THCLAV.CLIENTNAME, THCLAV.BRANCHNAME, THCLAV.CUSTOMERSERVICETEAMMANAGER FROM HC_LA_LOANACCOUNT THCLAV WHERE
AND THCLAV.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HC_LA_LOANACCOUNT ( ID, IDCARDNUMBER, STATUS, CUSTOMERSERVICEMANAGER, APPLYDATE, DISTRICTNAME, CREDITPRODUCTNAME, CUSTOMERSERVICEOFFICER, LOANBILLNUMBER, PHONENUMBER, CLIENTNAME, BRANCHNAME, CUSTOMERSERVICETEAMMANAGER ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{idCardNumber}, #{status}, #{customerServiceManager}, #{applyDate}, #{districtName}, #{creditProductName}, #{customerServiceOfficer}, #{loanBillNumber}, #{phoneNumber}, #{clientName}, #{branchName}, #{customerServiceTeamManager} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM HC_LA_LOANACCOUNT WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE hc_la_loanAccount
IDCARDNUMBER = #{idCardNumber,javaType=java.lang.String},
STATUS = #{status,javaType=java.lang.String},
CUSTOMERSERVICEMANAGER = #{customerServiceManager,javaType=java.lang.String},
APPLYDATE = #{applyDate,javaType=java.lang.String},
DISTRICTNAME = #{districtName,javaType=java.lang.String},
CREDITPRODUCTNAME = #{creditProductName,javaType=java.lang.String},
CUSTOMERSERVICEOFFICER = #{customerServiceOfficer,javaType=java.lang.String},
LOANBILLNUMBER = #{loanBillNumber,javaType=java.lang.String},
PHONENUMBER = #{phoneNumber,javaType=java.lang.String},
CLIENTNAME = #{clientName,javaType=java.lang.String},
BRANCHNAME = #{branchName,javaType=java.lang.String},
CUSTOMERSERVICETEAMMANAGER = #{customerServiceTeamManager,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE ID = #{id}
